column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////While on a cross country road trip and culinary tour of America
column2: one of our friends who is from Chicago told us to go here to taste the deep dish pizza Chicago is famous for. This place had a 30-45 minute wait and the pizzas take 35 minutes to cook so they took pre-orders. The service was transactional at best
column3: but the pizza was good! (My boyfriend is from New York and I am a big fan of thin crust
column4: so we're a tough couple to please) but the pizza was really good. We got the Malnatti's special which has cheeze and sausage. Yum!
